citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:15 PM on
03-Apr-17.
* Inspector honked GOV horn and called telephone numbers given by the licensee. Per telephone conservation,
the licensee stated they could not be home to do a facility inspection within 30 minutes.
* Copy of the inspection report was sent by certified and regular mail.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:15 PM on
03-Apr-17.
* Inspector honked GOV horn and called telephone numbers given by the licensee.  Per telephone conservation,
the licensee stated they could not be home to do a facility inspection within 30 minutes.
*   Copy of the inspection report was sent by certified and regular mail.
